amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to remove oil and gas lease sale 260 from the Draft Proposed OCS Oil and Gas Leasing Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to remove oil and gas lease sale 260 from the Draft Proposed OCS Oil and Gas Leasing Program.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A093) offered by Mr. Hudson.
